name: beanstalkd-worker
description: High level library for running beanstalkd workers in Node.js

scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.build: rm -rf lib/* && babel src --ignore test bluebirdCoroutines,runtime --out-dir lib
scripts.cover: cross-env NODE_PATH=src NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover _mocha -- --require scripts/mocha-bootload --check-leaks --colors --reporter spec test/unit/*.test.js test/unit/**/*.test.js
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: cross-env NODE_PATH=src NODE_ENV=test mocha --require scripts/mocha-bootload --check-leaks --colors --reporter spec test/unit/*.test.js test/unit/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:integration: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --require scripts/mocha-bootload --check-leaks --colors --reporter spec test/integration/*.test.js test/integration/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:integration:docker: docker-compose up -d && npm run test:integration && docker-compose down
scripts.restart-beanstalkd: docker-compose kill beanstalkd && docker-compose start beanstalkd
